text: Persea philippinensis is a species of plant in the family Lauraceae. It is endemic to the Philippines. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Persea philippinensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. Category:Flora of the Philippines philippinensis Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Persea philippinensis
